page.title: 11EVENTS IN LOCHALSH CALENDAR
page.content: Every year there are three important events. During the summer term,all the feeder primary schools of Plockton High School meet on the High School sports field.There are flat races,80m,100m, 400m and a relay race. While these are being run,other competitors try the long jump. After that there is an obstacle race and a tug-of-war. Our school has not won the shield yet but we had some finalists. At Christmas time there are parties in Achmore,Killilan and Balmacara.The pupils from each village go to their own parties.Santa goes to all the parties with toys. The Sunday School have a picnic at Balmacara Forestry site.The weather is usually good but the midges can be bad.It is always good fun.
